description.para: contains definitions of DesignWare UART register structure.

detaileddescription.para: Detailed struct description of DesignWare UART block register information, implementation of dev_uart_info::uart_regs

description.para: contains declarations of designware uart functions.
This are only used in uart object implementation source file

briefdescription.para: if this header file is included, will indicate that this designware uart device is used
